scripts.test:ping: sls invoke local -s dev -r eu-west-3 -f home-ping -d '{"queryStringParameters": {"soni": "present" }}'
scripts.test:tasks-cat: sls invoke local -s dev -r eu-west-3 -f tasks-cat
scripts.test:tasks-list: sls invoke local -s dev -r eu-west-3 -f tasks-list
scripts.test:tasks-do: sls invoke local -s dev -r eu-west-3 -f tasks-do -d '{"queryStringParameters": {"jarvis": "please"}, "pathParameters": {"id": 2}}'
scripts.test:tasks-clean-cat: sls invoke local -s dev -r eu-west-3 -f tasks-do -d '{"queryStringParameters": {"jarvis": "please"}, "pathParameters": {"id": "cat"}}'
